name: @tdmalone/ack
description: A simple AWS Lambda function that normalizes and sends an incoming payload to an SNS topic, while acknowledging back to the sender ASAP
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.docker-tests: yarn _execute "$( cat tests/fixtures/GET.json )" && yarn _execute "$( cat tests/fixtures/POST-form.json )" && yarn _execute "$( cat tests/fixtures/POST-json.json )"
scripts._execute: docker run --rm -e CI -e SNS_TOPIC -e RESPONSE_TEXT -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -v "${PWD}":/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler
